en: yours (second person singular possessive pronoun referring back to class 5 and 8 nouns)
your (second person singular possessive adjective modifying class 5 and 8 nouns)
your (second person singular emphatic possessive adjective modifying class 5 and 8 nouns)

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńtsɔ́ʼ lesoŋ sɔ́ɔn mbà mèŋ n ge tsɔ́ʼ shú.
en: If you pull out my tooth, I'll pull out yours.

ngiemboon: À pyě nɔ̀ɔn lê shùb shùb tà ḿmag.
en: He sowed the plot that “shub shub” until finished.
